TextObject.Name: Text3
TextObject.Text: Add new charting features to your report

ObjectFormatConditionFormulas.ToolTipText: "Powerful new charting features allow for more control over charts and legends"
"Add Conditional formatting to your fields. In this case, if amount is less than $1,000 then font appears in red."
"Visit the support site for samples, web forums, tutorials, technical briefs and more!"
